effect.shortEffect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.
effect.full: This Pokémon inflicts 1.25× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the same gender and 0.75× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the opposite gender. If either Pokémon is genderless, damage is unaffected.

description.diamond-pearl: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.
description.platinum: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.
description.black-white: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.
description.black-2-white-2: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.
description.x-y: Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender.
description.sun-moon: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.
description.sword-shield: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.
